attributes.action: Bring borstal school system back for young offenders
attributes.additional_details: Borstal school system was generally run by ex service men/women, which trained and managed youth giving them a better chance in future.
attributes.background: I strongly believe that borstal school system will help control  knife and gang related culture in our youths. Statistically re-offending ratio between borstal school system and prison is 30:78. Borstal school gave youth a chance to a better future.

rejection.details:
It's not clear what you would like the Government to do. Young people in custody are in a range of settings, which does not include prison:

https://www.gov.uk/young-people-in-custody/what-custody-is-like-for-young-people

You could start a petition seeking a change to how youth detention centres are run, such as by putting service personnel in charge, if that is what you would like to achieve.
